Window.previous-actors.title: Previous Actors
Window.selectable-actors.title: Selectable Actors
Window.combatant-picker.title:
Select a Token inside the canvas
or
Press here to cancel

SystemMessage.EndTurnNoCombat: Can't end turn. No combat is currently active.
SystemMessage.EndTurnNoCombatantPlaying: Can't end turn. No combatant is currently playing.
SystemMessage.EndTurnActorIsNotValid: Can't end turn. The current actor in combat is not valid.
SystemMessage.EndTurnNotYourTurn: Can't end turn. It's not your turn yet.
SystemMessage.EndTurnInvalidSelectedCombatant: Can't end turn. The selected combatant can't be found.
SystemMessage.EndTurnLastOrSecondLast: Can't pass turn to another combatant. The current combatant is the last on this round.
SystemMessage.EndTurnInvalidCombatId: A request to end turn can't be performed. The combatId provided is not valid.
SystemMessage.TryGetTokenInvalidId: Can't find the token. The provided combatant id can't be found.
SystemMessage.TryGetTokenInvalidCombatantId: Can't find the token. The provided token id is invalid.
SystemMessage.ConfigNoPermission: You have no permission to change initiative configuration.

Settings.configuration.title: Configuration
Settings.override-next-turn-description: Automatically prompt the Selection Window when pressing "End" or "Next" turn buttons from Combat Tracker. ( Reload Required )
Settings.select-when-round-is-over-description: Enable last actor to choose first combatant of next round.
Settings.select-themselves-when-round-is-over-tit: Allow Self-Selection at the start of the next round
Settings.select-themselves-when-round-is-over-des: Activate the option for a player to independently select themselves as the subsequent participant for consecutive rounds. This provides the player with the ability to maintain their position in the ongoing sequence if they so desire.
Settings.selection-window-stats-description: All the stats to show near each combatant
Settings.selection-window-icon-type-description: Select the icon to show when selecting the next combatant in turn
Settings.selection-window-anchor-description: Select the position of the selection window.
Settings.stat.clipboard: The stat has been copied to the clipboard
Settings.pick-stat.title: Pick a stat to be displayed
Settings.toggle-player-visibility.title: Show/Hide this stat to the player
Settings.reset-to-default-description: Reset all the configuration values to the default values. This operation can't be undone.
Settings.reset-to-default-modal-description: Are you sure you want to reset all the configuration to their default values? ( This operation can't be undone )
Settings.install-common-macros-description: New macros will be added to your library. One is used to select the next actor in the combat tracker and the other one used to open the configuration window
